Ammo.Name: Flechette Rounds
Ammo.Special: Weapons with this Ammo gain AP.

Ammo.Name: EMF Rounds
Ammo.Special: The model damaged by a weapon with this Ammo has its Speed reduced by 2 until the end of the target's next activation.

Ammo.Name: Concussive Rounds
Ammo.Special: When a weapon equipped with this Ammo hits an enemy model, the target is immediately moved 2" directly away from the firing model. If this causes the model to make contact with another model, or Terrain, apply 1 Damage to each of them.

Ammo.Name: Rapid Fire Rounds
Ammo.Special: When a weapon loaded with this Ammo rolls a 6 to hit, apply critical damage normally, then you may roll another Ranged Attack with this weapon.

Ammo.Name: Tracer Rounds
Ammo.Special: Apply Position Compromised to the model hit with this Ammo. The firing model also gains Position Compromised.
